line.text: %Cuckoo%: You are either stupendously brave or incredibly foolish, for you have entered the temple of the Madri. We do look forward to meeting you... if you're able survive to the very end.

response.text: %PLAYER%: Hey, Emma. A blond girl just faded in, spoke to us, and then faded out.

line.text: %Frost%: Not to worry, dear. That's merely a trick I taught the girls. It helps keep your opponent off balance.
